EmailTemplate.name: WC-2018-06-Request-a-Demo-PFL-Coffee and Mug Kits.Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Requesting a Turbonomic Demo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Thank you for requesting a demo with Turbonomic. Your request is being processed and a Turbonomic representative will be reaching out to schedule a time to meet at your convenience.
We look forward to discussing the challenges you are facing and how Turbonomic's Self-Managing Workload Automation can help. In the meantime, check out our resource center <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/]]>Â to learn more.
Sincerely,
Team Turbonomic
